txt.en: 'Thank you, [placeholder]! The spiders are showing no sign of leaving, but your efforts in the quarry surely won't hurt either!\n\n'Still, I wonder if I should move to Budgeford? I've always gotten along well with the Bolgers... better than I have with spiders, at any rate!'
You have defeated most, if not all, of the spiders in the quarry, but the most important spider to dispose of yet remains. You should find and defeat the Greenfields Queen.
The spiders can be found all throughout the quarry and at the cave they swarmed from, cut into the cliff-face by Scary.
The workers at the quarry in Scary have broken into a hidden chamber containing a nest of spiders, and the creatures have now overrun the whole quarry.
